LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.CustomerReminders.Admin.CustomerReminderMessageRecord.SearchEndDate.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The end date before which a reminder message was scheduled to be sent to the customer.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.CustomerReminders.Admin.CustomerReminderMessageRecord.SearchLoadNotSent
LocaleResource.Value: Load not sent reminder messages only.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.CustomerReminders.Admin.CustomerReminderMessageRecord.SearchLoadNotSent.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Search only for reminder messages that have not been sent yet and are still in the system message queue

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.CustomerReminders.Admin.CustomerReminderMessageRecord.SearchReminderId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The reminder for which messages were sent.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.CustomerReminders.Admin.CustomerReminderMessageRecord.SearchStartDate.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The start date after which a reminder message was scheduled to be sent to the customer.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.CustomerReminders.Admin.CustomerReminderMessageRecord.SearchToEmail.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The customer email to which a reminder message was sent.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.CustomerReminders.Admin.Reminder.ConditionMetDateEarlierThan.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The condition met date (the time when a product was added to the shopping cart for example) should be earlier than the specified interval.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.CustomerReminders.Admin.Reminder.ConditionMetDateEarlierThanIntervalType.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The condition met date (the time when a product was added to the shopping cart for example) should be earlier than the specified interval.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.CustomerReminders.Admin.Reminder.ConditionMetDateLaterThan.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The condition met date (the time when a product was added to the shopping cart for example) should be later than the specified interval.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.CustomerReminders.Admin.Reminder.ConditionMetDateLaterThanIntervalType.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The condition met date (the time when a product was added to the shopping cart for example) should be later than the specified interval.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.CustomerReminders.Admin.Reminder.Enabled.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether the reminder is enabled or not.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.CustomerReminders.Admin.Reminder.FieldValidationMessages.Interval
LocaleResource.Value: Reminder interval should be greater than 0.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.CustomerReminders.Admin.Reminder.FieldValidationMessages.NumberOfMessagesToSendPerCustomer
LocaleResource.Value: The number of reminders to send should be greater than 0.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.CustomerReminders.Admin.Reminder.IntervalBetweenMessages.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the time interval between messages sent to the customer.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.CustomerReminders.Admin.Reminder.IntervalBetweenMessagesType.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the time interval between messages sent to the customer. This interval can be in Days, Hours, Minutes

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.CustomerReminders.Admin.Reminder.MessageTemplateName.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The name of the message template.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.CustomerReminders.Admin.Reminder.NumberOfMessagesToSendPerCustomer
LocaleResource.Value: Number Of Messages To Send Per Customer

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.CustomerReminders.Admin.Reminder.NumberOfMessagesToSendPerCustomer.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies how many reminder messages should be sent to the customer.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.CustomerReminders.Admin.Reminder.ReminderExcludedCustomer.SaveBeforeEdit
LocaleResource.Value: You need to save the reminder before you can add excluded customers to it.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.CustomerReminders.Admin.Reminder.ReminderRuleId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The reminder rule is the condtion that needs to be met for a customer to receive a reminder. For example a customer has place an order but not paid for it or the customer has added products to their shopping cart but not ordered them.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.CustomerReminders.Admin.Reminder.ReminderRules.AbandonedShoppingCartReminder.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Selects customers who have added products to their shopping cart but have not ordered them.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.CustomerReminders.Admin.Reminder.ReminderRules.BirthdayReminder.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Select customers who have a birthday.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.CustomerReminders.Admin.Reminder.ReminderRules.CompletedOrderReminder.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Select orders which has been completed.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.CustomerReminders.Admin.Reminder.ReminderRules.InactiveCustomersReminder.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Selects customers who have registered on the web site but have not activated their registration.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.CustomerReminders.Admin.Reminder.ReminderRules.UnpaidOrdersReminder.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Selects customers who have placed an order but have not paid for it.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.CustomerReminders.Admin.Reminder.Store.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the Store for the reminder.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.CustomerReminders.Admin.MessageTemplate.Description.AbandonedShoppingCart
LocaleResource.Value: This message template is used to send message to the customers with abandoned shopping card. The message is received by a customer. You can disable this message from Administration -> Nop-Templates -> Plugins -> Customer Reminders -> Manage Customer Reminders.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.CustomerReminders.Admin.MessageTemplate.Description.BirthdayReminder
LocaleResource.Value: This message template is used to send message congratulating a customer for their birthday. The message is received by a customer. You can disable this message from Administration -> Nop-Templates -> Plugins -> Customer Reminders -> Manage Customer Reminders.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.CustomerReminders.Admin.MessageTemplate.Description.CompletedOrder
LocaleResource.Value: This message template is used to send a message to a customer for a completed order. The message is received by a customer. You can disable this message from Administration -> Nop-Templates -> Plugins -> Customer Reminders -> Manage Customer Reminders.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.CustomerReminders.Admin.MessageTemplate.Description.InactiveCustomers
LocaleResource.Value: This message template is used to send a message to inactive customers. The message is received by the inactive customer. You can disable this message from Administration -> Nop-Templates -> Plugins -> Customer Reminders -> Manage Customer Reminders.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.CustomerReminders.Admin.MessageTemplate.Description.UnpaidOrders
LocaleResource.Value: This message template is used to send a message customers with unpaid orders. The message is received by the customers with unpaid orders. You can disable this message from Administration -> Nop-Templates -> Plugins -> Customer Reminders -> Manage Customer Reminders.
